answers.answer: I'm due the same day!!!! Yes it is way to hot for this belly.. I'm miserable....I keep my ac on 24/7 plus have 3 fans blowing on me and I'm still hot. I'm ready for my baby girl to get here!
I'm due the 27th and agree with you both.  I live in Phoenix and it is ridiculous here.  I'm a teacher too and school started today.  I'm way yo exhausted these days.  Sept can't come soon enough.
Im also due on the 27th its awful outside. We have all the wildfires so on top of the heat we have the smoke. Can not wait!
I'm due 9/24, and the heat is killing me too!!! And on top of that, I've been short of breath  and having back and sciatic nerve pain. Sept needs to hurry!! :)
Im due 22nd but its winter here so its not too bad.

I'm due sep 27 also I'm also in phx and the heat *****!!! I'm with u on the shortness of breath I've have bad back pain to not in my lower back but my uper! I'm hoping he comes at least at 38 39 weeks just a lil early so I can see him and be finally done with the whole pregnancy thing for good! This is my last baby!

I am due Sep 20 and I feel everyone' s pain with this heat! July was bearable but these first few days of August have been rough here in southern Alabama. Good luck to all September mommies! We can do this!
I'm from the UK, so I guess it doesn't get too hot here, although I can't handle the heat but am due 27th Sept too :)

I'm due the 12th and with 5 weeks left to be pregnant and 3 weeks left of august, and no air in my car, im stuck inside unless I want to go outside and melt! Even the pool isn't cool and refreshing, its just hot!! Everything is hot!!

Due Sept 19, but will have a c section on the 12th. In Louisiana and the heat and humidity are killer. I had my first baby in May and my 2nd in July... August seems the worse month to be this far in a pregnancy ugh.
I'm due the 29th, but being induced the 19th. It is WAY too hot for thud belly, I live in Texas and it's been over a hundred for the last couple of weeks. I'm ready for my little girl :)
Not to bad over here in Ireland im due 18th sept but havib a c section on the 13 th hopefully it will fly by so I can meet my baby girl

I'm due the 15th and omg its been so hot and humid! Im in California and its only been like 85 but the humidity makes it so uncomfortable. Good luck with all your babies! Hope we get to see them soon: )

Im due sept 14 heat is killing me also. I normally love the heat but cant stand it this summer. Im tired of all these contractions and bored outta my mibd on bedrest. I have a feeling ill have an august baby tho.

Due Sept 11. I'm in WV and the past 3 days have been a little humid but mid July was killer. This is my 4th and last baby, and I'm borderline for preeclampsia, have horrible swelling...I'm over it at this point. Roughest pregnancy yet. My older 2 go back to school in 8 days and I'm hoping for a little break before she comes. Stay cool Mommas...we don't have that much longer left!

September 23...woot woot! :)The heat is hard. I sweat so much more now, than feel embarrased and get more over heated. :/I have just this week experienced cramps while walking. I can't imagine what labour will
be like....oO(I always press enter by accident. This forum needs an edit post button. )Anyway good luck September mommies!!

question: Is their anybody due in September? I'm due 9/25 and I'm so ready to have her I could cry. Its too hot for this belly. Is their anybody out there that feel my pain and if so when are u due?
title: September babies
